__inputs.name: DS_LINUXTELEGRAF
__inputs.label: $Database
__inputs.description: Create your own database for Telegraf

description: This dashboard will provide JVM metrics for a Java application instrumented with Jolokia Agent.

targets.query: SELECT mean("heap_memory_usage_init") FROM "jolokia" WHERE ("EC2_IPADDRESS" =~ /^$IP$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("heap_memory_usage_init") FROM "jolokia" WHERE ("EC2_IPADDRESS" =~ /^$IP$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT difference("CollectionCount") FROM "java_garbage_collector" WHERE ("EC2_IPADDRESS" =~ /^$IP$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"
SELECT difference("CollectionTime") FROM "java_garbage_collector" WHERE ("EC2_IPADDRESS" =~ /^$IP$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"

SELECT "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.G1 Eden Space.committed", "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.PS Eden Space.committed", "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.Par Eden Space.committed" FROM "java_last_garbage_collection" WHERE ("EC2_IPADDRESS" =~ /^$IP$/ AND ("name" = 'G1 Young Generation' OR "name" = 'PS Scavenge' OR "name" = 'ParNew')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"

SELECT mean(/last_gc_info_java.lang:name=$jolokia,type=GarbageCollector_LastGcInfo_memoryUsageAfterGc_.*Eden Space_init/) FROM "jolokia" WHERE ("EC2_IPADDRESS" =~ /^$IP$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.G1 Eden Space.max", "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.PS Eden Space.max", "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.Par Eden Space.max" FROM "java_last_garbage_collection" WHERE ("EC2_IPADDRESS" =~ /^$IP$/ AND ("name" = 'G1 Young Generation' OR "name" = 'PS Scavenge' OR "name" = 'ParNew')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"

SELECT "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.G1 Eden Space.used", "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.PS Eden Space.used", "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.Par Eden Space.used" FROM "java_last_garbage_collection" WHERE ("EC2_IPADDRESS" =~ /^$IP$/ AND ("name" = 'G1 Young Generation' OR "name" = 'PS Scavenge' OR "name" = 'ParNew')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"

SELECT "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.G1 Survivor Space.committed", "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.PS Survivor Space.committed", "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.Par Survivor Space.committed" FROM "java_last_garbage_collection" WHERE ("EC2_IPADDRESS" =~ /^$IP$/ AND ("name" = 'G1 Young Generation' OR "name" = 'PS Scavenge' OR "name" = 'ParNew')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"

SELECT mean(/last_gc_info_java.lang:name=$jolokia,type=GarbageCollector_LastGcInfo_memoryUsageAfterGc_.*Survivor Space_init/) FROM "jolokia" WHERE ("EC2_IPADDRESS" =~ /^$IP$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.G1 Survivor Space.max", "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.PS Survivor Space.max", "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.Par Survivor Space.max" FROM "java_last_garbage_collection" WHERE ("EC2_IPADDRESS" =~ /^$IP$/ AND ("name" = 'G1 Young Generation' OR "name" = 'PS Scavenge' OR "name" = 'ParNew')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"

SELECT "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.G1 Survivor Space.used", "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.PS Survivor Space.used", "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageBeforeGc.Par Survivor Space.used" FROM "java_last_garbage_collection" WHERE ("EC2_IPADDRESS" =~ /^$IP$/ AND ("name" = 'G1 Young Generation' OR "name" = 'PS Scavenge' OR "name" = 'ParNew')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"

SELECT "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.G1 Old Gen.committed", "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.PS Old Gen.committed", "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.CMS Old Gen.committed" FROM "java_last_garbage_collection" WHERE ("EC2_IPADDRESS" =~ /^$IP$/ AND ("name" = 'G1 Old Generation' OR "name" = 'PS MarkSweep' OR "name" = 'ConcurrentMarkSweep')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"

SELECT mean(/last_gc_info_java.lang:name=$jolokia,type=GarbageCollector_LastGcInfo_memoryUsageAfterGc_.*Old Gen_init/) FROM "jolokia" WHERE ("EC2_IPADDRESS" =~ /^$IP$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.G1 Old Gen.max", "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.PS Old Gen.max", "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.CMS Old Gen.max" FROM "java_last_garbage_collection" WHERE ("EC2_IPADDRESS" =~ /^$IP$/ AND ("name" = 'G1 Old Generation' OR "name" = 'PS MarkSweep' OR "name" = 'ConcurrentMarkSweep')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"

SELECT "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.G1 Old Gen.used", "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.PS Old Gen.used", "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.CMS Old Gen.used" FROM "java_last_garbage_collection" WHERE ("EC2_IPADDRESS" =~ /^$IP$/ AND ("name" = 'G1 Old Generation' OR "name" = 'PS MarkSweep' OR "name" = 'ConcurrentMarkSweep')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"

SELECT mean(/last_gc_info_java.lang:name=$jolokia,type=GarbageCollector_LastGcInfo_memoryUsageAfterGc_Metaspace_committed/) FROM "jolokia" WHERE ("EC2_IPADDRESS" =~ /^$IP$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT mean(/last_gc_info_java.lang:name=$jolokia,type=GarbageCollector_LastGcInfo_memoryUsageAfterGc_Metaspace_init/) FROM "jolokia" WHERE ("EC2_IPADDRESS" =~ /^$IP$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT mean(/last_gc_info_java.lang:name=$jolokia,type=GarbageCollector_LastGcInfo_memoryUsageAfterGc_Metaspace_max/) FROM "jolokia" WHERE ("EC2_IPADDRESS" =~ /^$IP$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT mean(/last_gc_info_java.lang:name=$jolokia,type=GarbageCollector_LastGcInfo_memoryUsageAfterGc_Metaspace_used/) FROM "jolokia" WHERE ("EC2_IPADDRESS" =~ /^$IP$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.Code Cache.committed" FROM "java_last_garbage_collection" WHERE ("EC2_IPADDRESS" =~ /^$IP$/ AND ("name" = 'G1 Young Generation' OR "name" = 'PS Scavenge' OR "name" = 'ParNew')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"

SELECT mean(/ast_gc_info_java.lang:name=$jolokia,type=GarbageCollector_LastGcInfo_memoryUsageAfterGc_Code Cache_init/) FROM "jolokia" WHERE ("EC2_IPADDRESS" =~ /^$IP$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.Code Cache.max" FROM "java_last_garbage_collection" WHERE ("EC2_IPADDRESS" =~ /^$IP$/ AND ("name" = 'G1 Young Generation' OR "name" = 'PS Scavenge' OR "name" = 'ParNew')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"

SELECT "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.Code Cache.used" FROM "java_last_garbage_collection" WHERE ("EC2_IPADDRESS" =~ /^$IP$/ AND ("name" = 'G1 Young Generation' OR "name" = 'PS Scavenge' OR "name" = 'ParNew')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"

SELECT "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.Compressed Class Space.committed" FROM "java_last_garbage_collection" WHERE ("EC2_IPADDRESS" =~ /^$IP$/ AND ("name" = 'G1 Young Generation' OR "name" = 'PS Scavenge' OR "name" = 'ParNew')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"

SELECT mean(/last_gc_info_java.lang:name=$jolokia,type=GarbageCollector_LastGcInfo_memoryUsageAfterGc_Compressed Class Space_init/) FROM "jolokia" WHERE ("EC2_IPADDRESS" =~ /^$IP$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.Compressed Class Space.max" FROM "java_last_garbage_collection" WHERE ("EC2_IPADDRESS" =~ /^$IP$/ AND ("name" = 'G1 Young Generation' OR "name" = 'PS Scavenge' OR "name" = 'ParNew')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"

SELECT "LastGcInfo.LastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc.Compressed Class Space.used" FROM "java_last_garbage_collection" WHERE ("EC2_IPADDRESS" =~ /^$IP$/ AND ("name" = 'G1 Young Generation' OR "name" = 'PS Scavenge' OR "name" = 'ParNew')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"

list.name: hostname
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM cpu WITH KEY = "EC2_HOSTNAME"

list.name: IP
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM cpu WITH KEY = "EC2_IPADDRESS" WHERE "EC2_HOSTNAME"=~/^$hostname$/

title: JVM Metrics - Jolokia 2
